comments.body:
Fixed in CVS.  However, you suggested fix is wrong, though.  See Bug 26147 for
details.

description:
jakarta-tomcat-5.0.24/webapps/jsp-examples/WEB-INF/jsp2/jsp2-example-taglib.tld
contains:
xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee web-jsptaglibrary_2_0.xsd

Note the space between j2ee and web-jsptaglibrary_2_0.xsd. It should be a 
slash. This causes some containers to fail resolve the schema location.
